definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
fortune as unpredictable as the weather, every day may bring fortune or calamity (idiom); sth unexpected may happen at any moment
pinyin: tian1 you3 bu4 ce4 feng1 yun2 , ren2 you3 dan4 xi1 huo4 fu2
containing_words.word: 天有不測風雲，人有旦夕禍福

definition: fate/portent/luck or disasters as foretold in the stars (astrology)
disaster and happiness do not follow rules (idiom); future blessings and misfortunes are unpredictable
to stick together through thick and thin (idiom)

sentences.english: The happy and the disaster are in together at anytime, we should accept it with normal attitude.
sentences.chinese: 任何時候禍福都是並存的，我們要放平心態去接受。

sentences.english: Fortune and misfortune are existence together in anytime , we should accept it with our normal attitude .
sentences.chinese: 任何時候禍福都是並存的，我們要放平心態去接受。

sentences.english: Out of the mouth of the most High proceedeth not evil and good?
sentences.chinese: 禍福不都出於至高者的口嗎。

sentences.english: He believes that everybody's life is predestined.
sentences.chinese: 認爲人生禍福早有定數。

sentences.english: No doubt we tasted the sour, sweet, bitter, hot, cold and engraved ring.
sentences.chinese: 不惑的我們嚐遍了酸甜苦辣，冷暖禍福刻滿了年輪。

definition: variant of 輾轉|辗转[zhan3 zhuan3]
to seek luck and avoid calamity (idiom)
